- url: full page URL
- pathname: page path

title: Extract all ZocDoc reviews from HTML
description: Parse the downloaded ZocDoc HTML file to extract all 49 patient reviews. Save them in structured JSON format in data/reviews/ folder. Currently only 9 reviews are hardcoded - need to get all 49.
notes:
COMPLETED: Successfully extracted 23 unique 5-star reviews from the ZocDoc HTML file.

Findings:
- Created data/reviews/ folder with extracted reviews in JSON format
- All 23 extracted reviews are 5-star ratings
- Only 23 of 49 total reviews were extracted because the HTML only contained the initially loaded reviews (ZocDoc uses lazy loading)
- Created Python extraction script in scripts/extract-reviews-from-html.py
- Created README documenting the extraction process and findings

Files created:
- data/reviews/zocdoc-reviews-extracted.json (23 reviews)
- data/reviews/summary.json (statistics)
- data/reviews/README.md (documentation)
- scripts/extract-reviews-from-html.py (extraction tool)

To get all 49 reviews: Visit ZocDoc page, scroll/load all reviews, save HTML with all reviews loaded, re-run extraction script.

Current status: Extraction complete. Ready to update website with 23 reviews (up from current 9).
